item.title: Kaboom: TryHackMe - Industrial Intrusion - Task 8
item.description: Writeup TL;DR: Crafting malicious Modbus packets and gaining a reverse shell by uploading a malicious PLC program. This challenge drops you into the shoes of the APT operator: With a single crafted Modbus, you over-pressurise the main pump, triggering a thunderous blow-out that floods the plant with alarms. While chaos reigns, your partner ghosts through the shaken DMZ and installs a stealth implant, turning the diversion‚Äôs echo into your persistent beachhead.
